text: "Freedom" is a 1984 song by English pop duo Wham! and is taken from their second studio album Make It Big. It went to number 1 in Iceland, Ireland, Norway and the United Kingdom, number 2 in Belgium and the Netherlands, number 3 in the Netherlands and the United States, number 5 in Finland and Switzerland, number 8 in New Zealand and South Africa, number 9 in Sweden, number 10 in Canada, number 14 in Germany, number 16 in France and number 23 in Austria. Category:1984 songs Category:Wham! songs
title: Freedom (Wham! song)
